data.text: @PhysEdDynasty @PHECanada Thanks a lot brother that means a lot. Much respect my friend
@jonyx25 @PHECanada I mention only two #Rolemodels in the article, but I could have listed more. John, role models of #leadership, like yourself, are few and far between. Keep crushing it!! 👊
@PHECanada @PhysEdDynasty Great read! Thanks for sharing your story as it is not always easy to share such personal experiences on this platform.
@PHECanada @PhysEdDynasty Mr V, as someone who's been struggling with the pandemic wall the past couple months, this was a really helpful read. You're a good man. Thank you.
@PHECanada @PhysEdDynasty Congratulations Dan V. You are truly amazing. A role model for all educators.
